org.platanios.learn.math.matrix

Class QRDecomposition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.platanios.learn.math.matrix.QRDecomposition

  • public class QRDecomposition
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the QR decomposition algorithm for matrix \(A\). Given \(A\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}\), with \(m\geq n\), the QR decomposition is an orthogonal matrix \(Q\in\mathbb{R}^{m\times n}\) and an upper triangular matrix \(R\in\mathbb{R}^{n\times n}\), such that \(A=QR\). The QR decomposition always exists, even if the matrix does not have full rank, and so the constructor of this class will never fail. Furthermore, the primary use of the QR decomposition is in the least squares solution of non-square systems of simultaneous matrix equations. In that case, in order to obtain a solution, the matrix has to have full rank.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Antonios Platanios

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int columnDimension
      The column dimension of the matrix whose decomposition is being computed.
      private boolean isFullRank
      A boolean value indicating whether or not the matrix whose decomposition is being computed is full rank.
      private double[][] QR
      Two-dimensional array used for internal storage of the decomposition factors.
      private double[] rDiagonal
      One-dimensional array used for internal storage of the diagonal of the upper triangular factor, \(R\).
      private int rowDimension
      The row dimension of the matrix whose decomposition is being computed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QRDecomposition

        public QRDecomposition(Matrix matrix)
        Constructs a QR decomposition object for the provided matrix. The actual decomposition is computed within this constructor using Householder reflections.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The matrix whose QR decomposition is being computed.

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public Vector solve(Vector vector)
             throws SingularMatrixException
        Solves the linear system of equations \(A\boldsymbol{x}=\boldsymbol{b}\) for \(\boldsymbol{x}\) and returns the result as a new vector. The solution is obtained efficiently by using the QR decomposition.
        Parameters:
        vector - Vector \(\boldsymbol{b}\) in equation \(A\boldsymbol{x}=\boldsymbol{b}\).
        Returns:
        The solution of the system of equations.
        Throws:
        SingularMatrixException

      • solve

        public Matrix solve(Matrix matrix)
             throws SingularMatrixException
        Solves the linear system of equations \(AX=B\) for \(X\) and returns the result as a new matrix. The solution is obtained efficiently by using the QR decomposition.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix \(B\) in equation \(AX=B\).
        Returns:
        The solution of the system of linear equations.
        Throws:
        SingularMatrixException

      • getH

        public Matrix getH()
        Gets the Householder reflection vectors.
        Returns:
        A lower trapezoidal matrix whose columns define the reflections, as a new matrix.
